sourcesContent:
import { useCallback } from "react"; import Quill from 'quill' import "quill/dist/quill.snow.css" const TOOLBAR_OPTIONS = [ [{ header: [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, false] }], [{ font: [] }], [{ list: "ordered" }, { list: "bullet" }], ["bold", "italic", "underline"], [{ color: [] }, { background: [] }], [{ script: "sub" }, { script: "super" }], [{ align: [] }], ["image", "blockquote", "code-block"], ["clean"], ]; const MyTextEditor = () => { const wrapperRef =useCallback (wrapper => { if (wrapper== null) return wrapper.innerHTML = "" const myeditor = document.createElement ("div") wrapper.append(myeditor) new Quill(myeditor, {theme: 'snow' ,modules: {toolbar : TOOLBAR_OPTIONS}}) }, []) return
} export default MyTextEditor
